thread.title: homely comfort in excellent location
thread.title_full: homely comfort in excellent location - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: booktowrite
title: homely comfort in excellent location
text: I loved this hotel. The room had a great shower, bed, TV, climate control and was modern, neat and comfortable. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly. The spyglass bar has a great view of the Empire State Building and is a great place to have a few cocktails. The location is perfect in that that it is a short walk from Times Square and the New York Public library.
